title: 【運維開發工程師】 DevOps Engineer
company: 智鈦星平台服務有限公司
subcription:
*維護並確保網路平台相關系統正常運作，改版優化及故障狀況處理。

工作內容：

1.運作維護：
  系統及服務網路日常監控與調整，確保運行的可靠性、可用性及穩定性。

2.異常排除：
　針對異常狀況與事件，快速回報處理，並排除故障。

3.優化管理：
  平台系統管理及檢查，提升系統安全性及作業環境的執行速度與效能。

4.跨部門支援：
　協助各相關部門，根據狀況及需求完善處理事件。

5.需求技能：
　Linux Server、 Zabbix 監控管理，具AWS cloud經驗佳。

title: 【軟體 測試工程師/資深測試工程師】 Quality Assurance Engineer jr./sr.
company: 智鈦星平台服務有限公司
subcription:
*負責iPhone/Android/Web各平台軟體測試，如功能性測試、整合性/相容性測試、使用測試…確保專案成效。 

《工作說明》：

1. 依據專案需求擬定測試計劃，並規劃合理有效之測試時程。

2. 理解團隊方向，測試分析、執行及跟進專案項目。

3. 設計與撰寫測試計劃與測試案例。

4. Bug管理提交與追蹤修正進度。

5. 根據測試過程與結果，提供改善建議及相關測試報告。


《期望技術》：

1. 熟悉常用之自動化測試工具，能獨立完成自動化測試 (優先考量)。

2. 精通測試流程與測試案例設計之方法，能撰寫清楚完備之測試案例報告。

3. 具測試實務經驗如(功能性、整合、使用、問題追蹤處理)等。

title: Business Analyst, Data Analysis and Administration
company: 英屬百慕達商美國再保險股份有限公司台灣分公司
subcription:
The primary responsibilities of this role are: •	Use RGA administration system to process client statement/data to ensure accuracy and completeness on the final results for reporting.
•	For statements not received, make sure correct accrual methods are adopted and reasonable amounts are accrued at each month end process
•	Identify risks to be ceded out and calculate related amounts accurately according to retrocession arrangement at each month end
•	Map or remap data into a common format in case of new format or format hange on client data
•	Extract and analyze data to fulfill ad hoc projects, e.g. experience study
•	Support on various management reporting tasks
•	Support to review treaty content from admin's perspective
•	Support on BAT activities
•	Support on different type of project execution and management
•	Actively involved in team discussion and be able to effectively communicate with other local functions

Administration

Ensure that the company’s administration standards and time service requirements are applied to the handling of all business received.
Ensure that the administration of all Taiwan business adheres to RGA treaties.
Provide administration data for input to accounting records, valuation systems and regulatory requirements.
Maintain a professional and working relationship with clients.

Reinsurance

Maintain a thorough knowledge of Taiwan reinsurance practices and specific RGA treaty practices as they pertain to the management and handling of transfer of risk.
Ensure the Taiwan business is administered appropriately through the RGA chain of companies and the International Retro Pool.

Data Management

Participate in the analysis of results and monthly statistics to include:

New business volume (AAR, annualized premium, policy count) assumed and retro
Inforce (AAR, annualized premium, policy count) assumed and retro.
Explanation of fluctuations in policy-related accounts (premium, allowances, etc) and explanations of variance of the same to plan.

Participate in claims analysis and management.

Implement administrative procedures and controls for:

New business and termination processing.
Monthly billing
Claims handling
Statistical reporting
New client review

Interactions

Contribute to the team and respect the culture of the company.

Working closely with other RGA Taiwan teams, Claims, Underwriting, Pricing, Accounts & Financial Reporting, as well as associates from the International Support team based in St. Louis.

title: QA 軟體測試工程師
company: 匯誠國際支付股份有限公司
subcription:
職務內容： 1. 了解需求制定與撰寫測試案例，測試執行並產生測試報告。

3. 依據產品或專案設計需求，整理使用者各種操作流程並進行分析。

6. 測試文件、測試腳本更新與維護。

職務要求：
1. 1年以上自動化測試及開發經驗。
2. 熟悉前後端程式架構邏輯。
3. 熟悉一種以上自動化測試工具或框架(Postman、JMeter...)
4. 能制定與撰寫測試案例，並熟悉資料庫基本知識和常用命令。

加分：
1. 熟悉雲端服務架構 (GCP, AWS, Azure...)。
2. 熟悉Linux指令。
3. 熟悉 Web, API, Mobile App 等相關測試。
4. 有VAPT相關測試經驗。

title: |Digital Services| Infrastructure Operations Engineer
company: 法商_施耐德電機股份有限公司
subcription:
Do you dream of working in a company that is driven by a meaningful purpose? An inclusive company that empowers you to do your best and be innovative? 
At Schneider Electric, we believe access to energy and digital is a basic human right. We empower all to do more with less, ensuring Life Is On everywhere, for everyone, at every moment. We provide energy and automation digital solutions for efficiency and sustainability.

We are looking for Infrastructure Operations Engineer to make an impact!
What you will do:

1. Responsible for server, network infrastructure and telephony implementation & project management
2. Follow corporate policy and ISO standards, guidelines and procedure for system, Network and security implementation & support to align with internal control.
3. Monitor the performance of the system and providing on-going support & maintenance services including execution of daily routines, incident follow-up, change request management, disaster recovery drill and system performance tuning
4. Coordinate system maintenance activities to ensure high availability and reliability of system services
5. Provide technical support to application development team and help desk team for service facilitation
6. Source and recommend fit-for-purpose technology solutions to fulfill the business objectives including the planning and proposal of landscape
7. Relevant Vendor selection and management for maintenance activities or some of project, and including related contract signature process, PR and Payment process completion monthly
8. Assist and co-work in ad hoc projects or change management when required by regional or global team

title: 軟體開發工程師 Software Developer
company: Eunodata_御諾資訊股份有限公司
subcription:
工作簡介 
我們正在招募【軟體開發工程師】來開發可擴充的系統解決方案。 您將成為產品開發團隊的主要開發人員，負責從初期概念規劃到部署上線的整個軟體產品開發的過程。作為一名軟體開發工程師，您應該熟悉全棧編碼語言(full-stack)、開發框架和第三方組件庫 (third-party component libraries)。

工作職掌

-與開發團隊和產品經理一起找出可行的解決方案
-與我們的客戶一起改進產品功能以滿足他們的要求
-使用後端框架開發相關服務及 API
-測試軟體產品的品質和效能
-故障排除、調試和升級軟件
-編寫技術文件

Job brief
-We are looking for a  Software Developer to produce scalable software solutions. You will be the major developer in product development team that's responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.
-As a Full Stack Developer, you should be comfortable around full-stack coding languages, development frameworks and third-party component libraries. 

Responsibilities
-Work with development teams and product managers to find out feasible solutions
-Work with our customers to improve product to meet their requirements
-Develop beck-end services with effective APIs by framework
-Test software quality and efficiency
-Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
-Write technical documentation

company: 台達電子工業股份有限公司 _DELTA ELECTRONICS INC.
subcription:
DDC (Digital Design Center, 數位設計中心) 成立於2021年，配合集團在智能製造、工業4.0的發展，主要致力於將台達集團內部的【CAD設計相關之工程資訊】，標準化、結構化、數位化來加速實踐智能製造。持續依照三個目標進行，(1) 協助建立跨事業單位的 CAD 工程設計準則，建立一致性、通用性的規範；(2) 建立 CAD 零件標準化軟體，整合跨系統之間的 CAD 資訊串聯；(3) 建立 CAD 系統自動優化與調適，以實踐 Closed-Loop 智能製造。 
【工作內容】
1. Schematics/E-CAD相關題目之研究
2. 演算法開發與優化
3. 與跨職能團隊的成員密切合作，開發優質產品

【具備技能】
1. 熟悉 Simplorer or FloTHERM 等跨軟體的 Circuit/ Symbol 特性模擬研究分析
2. 熟悉 Python 程式開發

title: 中華電信子公司-資訊處(總部)-軟體開發工程師
company: 中華電信關係企業_宏華國際股份有限公司
subcription:
★單位擴編，尋找新血加入!!★ 軟體工程部正在尋找有經驗、有才華且充滿熱情的人員來擔任軟體開發工程師一職。

此職務為 ASP.NET(C#)開發相關，職責如下
1. 使用.NET Core框架進行程式開發，需要時可使用其他相關技術和工具。
2. 設計和實現軟體架構，並確保專案發展可符合標準。
3. 團隊成員合作，確保團隊工作的順利進行和高效完成。
4. 解決軟體開發過程中的問題，並能提供技術支援和指導交流。
5. 持續學習和掌握新技術和工具，以提高開發能力和知識水平。

我們是一個年輕的團隊，如果您也想要專長得以發揮，歡迎加入我們的行列!
